resources.name: My latest emails
resources.description: Retrieves the 15 most recent emails from the user's Inbox, including subject, sender, received time, and read status.

resources.name: Upcoming calendar events
resources.description: Lists the next 10 upcoming calendar events, including subject, start/end time, location, and organizer.

resources.name: My contacts
resources.description: Shows the first 10 personal contacts with name, email addresses, and mobile number.

resources.name: Unread emails
resources.description: Retrieves the 10 most recent unread emails from the user's mailbox with subject, sender, and time.

resources.name: My mail folders
resources.description: Lists the mail folders in the user's mailbox (like Inbox, Sent, Drafts, Archive, etc).
